function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity within the white circles could lead to increased spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"High risk of transmission of contagious diseases within the park.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict guidelines on the number of people allowed within each circle and provide clear communication on the importance of maintaining distance.","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Visitors to the park","Owner":"Park management"},{"Description":"Limited access and multiple entry points may lead to inconsistent enforcement of mask-wearing and temperature checks, increasing the risk of contagious disease spread.","Impact":"Inadequate control measures leading to higher risk of contagion within the park.","Mitigation":"Implement centralized checkpoints at all entrances for more consistent monitoring and enforcement of safety measures.","Technologies":"Centralized temperature scanning and mask detection technology","People":"Park visitors, staff, and management","Owner":"Park management"},{"Description":"Encouraging physical interaction through the use of mirrors and banners could lead to unintended close contact and potential spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission due to unintentional close contact facilitated by park attractions.","Mitigation":"Reconsider the use of interactive attractions that encourage close physical contact, and focus on promoting safe distancing measures through alternative means.","Technologies":"No specific technologies mentioned","People":"Park visitors","Owner":"Park management"}]}
